config.title: Arturo Jara
config.description: I have 25+ years of experience as a copywriter, creative director, brand planner, and storyteller. I am passionate about advertising, creativity, short stories, poetry, and the digital world. I am a huge NFL fan, and the Dallas Cowboys is my favorite team. I love almost all kinds of music, but Iron Maiden, Leonard Cohen, and heavy metal are my favorite ones. I enjoy running, drumming, and writing.
